title: Click Edge Detection and Counting Function Block
description:
CLICK_DEC decodes multiple keystrokes and signals to diferent outputs
the number of pulses. An input signal without falling edge within TC is is￾sued at Q0 and remains TRUE until IN goes on FALSE. A pulse followed by
a TRUE is output to Q1 and so on. Is a pulse registered within TC which is
followed by the state FALSE, then TRUE appear at the corresponding out￾put for a PLC cycle.
name: CLICK_DEC

input.name: IN
input.description: Boolean input signal that triggers edge detection.

input.name: TC
input.description: Time constant used for timing operations within the block.

output.name: Q0
output.description: Output signal activated when the count is zero.

output.name: Q1
output.description: Output signal activated when the count is one.

output.name: Q2
output.description: Output signal activated when the count is two.

output.name: Q3
output.description: Output signal activated when the count is three.
